txt.en:
'In the deepest reaches of the mine, there is a terrible worm that has grown to enormous size.

'This creature has on occasion slithered out of its pit and preyed upon unwary slaves, murdering and devouring them before disappearing back into its hole.

'If you could find and defeat this devourer of Men, you will save many from a terrible fate.'
'It is good to know that this nightmare no longer hunts my people in the depths of the mine. You have my thanks, [placeholder].'
One of the pit-worms has grown to gigantic size and has been known to crawl out of the pits below and prey upon unwary slaves.
The Devourer dwells somewhere in the Orc-mines.\n\nMeriun asked you to find and defeat the Devourer, an enormous pit-worm that hunts unwary slaves within the mine.
Talk to Meriun in the Orc-mines
Meriun is in the Orc-mines.\n\nYou should return and tell Meriun that you have slain the Devourer.
